files.README.md:
# Softever Claude Marketplace

## Install

Add the marketplace:
```sh
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/softever/claude-marketplace.git
```

Install a plugin:
```sh
/plugin install <plugin-name>@softever-claude-marketplace
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Repository | Description |
|--------|------------|-------------|
| softever-angular-upgrade | https://github.com/peter9294/softever-angular-upgrade | Angular upgrade utilities |

### softever-angular-upgrade

```sh
/plugin install softever-angular-upgrade@softever-claude-marketplace
```
